sub_title: Director and urbanist at East West Urban Consultancy
summary:
Carbon neutrality, climate adaptation and resilient urban & rural development are our main tasks nowadays. 

Having worked as a urban planner for more than 25 year in the Netherlands and China, with a lot of experience in urban planning, project process, knowledge exchange between European and Chinese cities, I set up East West Urban Consultancy. Since 2013, the office has been intensively involved in projects on sustainable urban development between NL/EU and China. By offering advice, trainings, workshops, conferences, study visits wherein decision makers, urban planners & experts are involved, we will increase the sense of sustainable development. The cities can learn from each other and will develope in a balanced and sustainable way.  

Core business: 

- Advice to NL, EU and China organizations concerning themes on climate change and resilient development.
- Participating EU projects (function as key expert) cooperating with China in sustainable development. 
- Organizing trainings, delegations & study visit for Chinese cities on sustainable urban development 
- Promoting and match making cooperation between Chinese and their EU partners.
- Giving lectures, speeches & interviews related to China & EU sustainable urban development 

Please visit our website:ewuc.eu/reference for more information.
